dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1229 IS: End Taxpayer Subsidies for Electric Vehicles Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Paul introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the clean vehicle credit.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the End Taxpayer Subsidies for Electric Vehicles Act.

subsection.text: Subpart B of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking section 30D (and by striking the item relating to such section in the table of sections for such subpart).

paragraph.text: Section 30B(d)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subparagraph (D).
Section 38(b) of such Code is amended by striking paragraph (30).

Section 179D(d)(3)(B)(ii) of such Code is amended by inserting , as in effect on the day before the date of the enactment of the End Taxpayer Subsidies for Electric Vehicles Act after section 30D(g)(9).
Section 1016(a) of such Code is amendedâ€”

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (36), by adding and at the end,

paragraph.text: Section 6213(g)(2) of such Code is amended by striking subparagraph (T).

Section 6417(d)(1)(A)(iv) of such Code is amended by inserting , as in effect on the day before the date of the enactment of the End Taxpayer Subsidies for Electric Vehicles Act after section 30D(g)(9).
Section 6501(m) of such Code is amended by striking 30D(f)(6),.

Section 166(b)(5)(A)(ii) of title 23, United States Code, is amended by inserting , as in effect on the day before the date of the enactment of the End Taxpayer Subsidies for Electric Vehicles Act after section 30D(d)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to vehicles placed in service during any calendar year beginning after the date of enactment of this Act.
